channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 00:51 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 00:51 Driven anxiety in the Nikolaev area. Solve for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 00:50 PM Alarm to the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 00:50 PM Alarm to the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.#Kherson_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
